段: 有烏面人名叫Pan-iang5，出世ti7 亞非利加州內地，近ti7 赤道。伊 e5 祖上是生番，極野，會食人。伊囡仔e5 時hou7人掠，去海邊，賣做奴才；有賣過幾若人 e5 手，路尾有一人tiam3 ti7 幾內亞 e5 地方買--來。這個主人亦是烏面人。

U7 ou-bin7-lang5 mia5 kio3 Pan-iang5, chhut-si3 ti7 A-hui-li7-ka chiu lai7-te7, kin7 ti7 chhek-to7. I e5 chou2-chiuN7 si7 chhiN-hoan, kek8 ia2, e7 chiah8 lang5. I gin2-a2 e5 si5 hou7 lang5 liah8, khi3 hai2-piN, be7 cho3 lou5-chai5; u7 be7 koe3 kui2-na7 lang5 e5 chhiu2, lou7-boe2 u7 chit8 lang5 tiam3 ti7 Ki-loe7-a e5 te7-hng be2--lai5. Chit e5 chu2-lang5 iah8 si7 ou-bin7-lang5.
Hit所在 e5 風俗真歹，攏m7 bat道理；人常常去山內，掠人來賣做奴才，到hit所在奴才不止濟；攏m7 bat禮義，有夠khian3-sng2，極歹 e5品行。這個Pan-iang5 本亦是這號e5 款式。

Hit sou2-chai7 e5 hong-siok8 chin phaiN2, long2 m7 bat to7-li2; lang5 siong5-siong5 khi3 soaN-lai7, liah8 lang5 lai5 be7 cho3 lou5-chai5, kau3 hit sou2-chai7 lou5-chai5 put-chi2 che7; long2 m7 bat le2-gi7, u7 kau3 khian3-sng2, kek8 phaiN2 e5 phin2-heng7. 幾十年前教會差牧師去tiam3 hit個地，創禮拜堂，播揚福音 e5 教示。一廿年前，牧師看見這個Pan-iang5有時入禮拜堂，若是牧師攏無致意，扑算是憨e5 奴才，beh入來看看nia7-tiaN7；牧師攏無想著用道理 kap伊議論。

Kui2 chap8 ni5 cheng5 kau3-hoe7 chhe bok8-su khi3 tiam3 hit e5 te7, chhong3 le2-pai3-tng5, po3-iong5 hok-im e5 ka3-si7. It-jiap8 ni5 cheng5, bok8-su khoaN3-kiN3 chit e5 Pan-iang5 u7-si5 jip8 le2-pai3-tng5, na7 si7 bok8-su long2 bo5 ti3-i3, phah-sng3 si7 gong7 e5 lou5-chai5, beh jip8 lai5 khoaN3-khoaN3 nia7-tiaN7; bok8-su long2 bo5 siuN7 tioh8 eng7 to7-li2 kap i gi7-lun7.
有一日牧師ti7 家己 e5 學房teh讀冊，人 ti7 外面扑門，牧師請伊入；人就入，看是這個Pan-iang5，伊 e5 面色不只緊切；牧師就問--伊︰「Pan-iang5 ah，你啥事？有甚物艱苦無？」Pan-iang5 應，講︰「先生ah，有艱苦；我e5 靈魂危險，ai3先生你替我祈禱。」

U7 chit8 jit8 bok8-su ti7 ka-ti7 e5 oh8-pang5 teh thak8-chheh, lang5 ti7 goa7-bin7 phah-mng5, bok8-su chhiaN2 i jip8; lang5 chiu7 jip8, khoaN3 si7 chit e5 Pan-iang5, i e5 bin7-sek put-chi2 kin2-chhiat; bok8-su chiu7 mng7--i,“Pan-iang5 ah, li2 siaN2-su7? U7 sim2-mih8 kan-khou2 bo5?”Pan-iang5 in3, kong2,“Sian-siN ah, u7 kan-khou2; goa2 e5 leng5-hun5 hui5-hiam2, ai3 sian-siN li2 the3 goa2 ki5-to2.”
牧師代先扑算這個奴才極憨，攏be7曉得 想靈魂e5 代誌；今聽見伊迫切講到an2-ni，就大奇怪，來詳細問--伊，試看真正有大醒悟靈魂危險 e5 代誌，ai3得著救，抑無。

Bok8-su tai7-seng phah-sng3 chit e5 lou5-chai5 kek8 gong7, long2 be7 hiau2-tit siuN7 leng5-hun5 e5 tai7-chi3; taN thiaN-kiN3 i pek-chhiat kong2 kau3 an2-ni, chiu7 toa7 ki5-koai3, lai5 siong5-se3 mng7--i, chhi3-khoaN3 chin-chiaN3 u7 toa7 chhiN2-gou7 leng5-hun5 gui5-hiam2 e5 tai7-chi3, ai3 tit tioh8 kiu3, a2-bo5.
牧師看見Pan-iang5實在有醒悟，就將道理來教示--伊，kap伊跪落，替伊祈禱。Pan-iang5亦續祈禱，款式不止謙遜，認家己 e5 重罪，求上帝tai3念救主 e5 功勞赦免--伊。然後Pan-iang5常常照期來問洗禮受教示。有時牧師koh請伊來學房，kap伊詳細議論，相kap祈禱。

Bok8-su khoaN3-kiN3 Pan-iang5 sit8-chai7 u7 chhiN2-gou7, chiu7 chiong to7-li2 lai5 ka3-si7--i, kap i kui7--loh8, the3 i ki5-to2. Pan-iang5 iah8 soa3 ki5-to2, khoan2-sit put-chi2 khiam-sun3, jin7 ka-ti7 e5 tang7-choe7, kiu5 Siong7-te3 tai3-liam7 Kiu3-chu2 e5 kong-lo5 sia3-bian2--i. Jian5-au7 Pan-iang5 siong5-siong5 chiau3-ki5 lai5 mng7 se2-le2 siu7 ka3-si7. U7-si5 bok8-su koh chhiaN2 i lai5 oh8-pang5, kap i siong5-se3 gi7-lun7, saN-kap ki5-to2.

Pan-iang5 醒悟家己 e5 罪，比平常問洗禮 e5 人koh 較深，切要求，ai3脫離後來e5 刑罰。無偌久直直信耶穌，心得平安，知上帝赦免罪 e5 疼痛，就歡喜到be7顧--tit，求入教會 thang 公行認救主 e5 名。教會當職 e5人幾若擺查問--伊，看見伊知道理雖然無到極深，iau2-ku2明白得著救 e5 路，亦會講，「我e5 心本青暝，今會看見。」當這個人看見伊 e5 意思誠實切要，所以m7 敢久久延chhian5，就接納伊領洗禮，thang相kap坐主e5 桌。

Pan-iang5 chhiN2-gou7 ka-ti7 e5 choe7, pi2 peng5-siong5 mng7 se2-le2 e5 lang5 koh khah chhim, chhiat-iau3 kiu5, ai3 thoat-li7 au7-lai5 e5 heng5-hoat8. Bo5 joa7 ku2 tit8-tit8 sin3 Ia5-sou, sim tit peng5-an, chai Siong7-te3 sia3-bian2 choe7 e5 thiaN3-thang3, chiu7 hoaN-hi2 kau3 be7 kou3--tit, kiu5 jip8 kau3-hoe7 thang kong-heng5 jin7 Kiu3-chu2 e5 mia5. Kau3-hoe7 tng-chit e5 lang5 kui2-na7 pai2 chha5-mng7--i, khoaN3-kiN3 i chai to7-li2 sui-jian5 bo5 kau3 kek8 chhim, iau2-ku2 beng5-pek8 tit tioh8 kiu3 e5 lou7, iah8 e7 kong2,“Goa2 e5 sim pun2 chhiN-mi5, taN e7 khoaN3-kiN3.”Tng-chit e5 lang5 khoaN3-kiN3 i e5 i3-su3 seng5-sit8 chhiat-iau3, sou2-i2 m7 kaN2 ku2-ku2 ian5-chhian5, chiu7 chiap-lap8 i nia2 se2-le2, thang saN-kap che7 Chu2 e5 toh.
Pan-iang5 放sak世俗，kap主結永遠 e5 約，就liam5-piN 用歡喜熱熱盡忠 e5 心，行逐項 e5 本份；親像屬主e5人所應該行--e5。伊 e5 款式kap 早大各樣；早做憨 e5奴才，面有下賤憂悶 e5 色緻；今伊 e5 面改換光光，做歡喜 e5色，顯明心內敬上帝，疼人，大向望後來 e5 福氣。

Pan-iang5 pang3-sak se3-siok8, kap Chu2 kiat eng2-oan2 e5 iok, chiu7 liam5-piN eng7 hoaN-hi2 jiat8-jiat8 chin7-tiong e5 sim, kiaN5 tak8-hang7 e5 pun2-hun7; chhin-chhiuN7 siok8 Chu2 e5 lang5 sou2 eng-kai kiaN5--e5. I e5 khoan2-sit kap cha2 toa7 koh-iuN7; cha2 cho3 gong7 e5 lou5-chai5, bin7 u7 ha7-chian7 iu-bun7 e5 sek-ti7; taN i e5 bin7 ke2-oaN7 kng-kng, cho3 hoaN-hi2 e5 sek, hian2-beng5 sim-lai7 keng3 Siong7-te3, thiaN3-lang5, toa7 ng3-bang7 au7--lai5 e5 hok-khi3.

聖冊講︰「舊 e5 代誌過去，攏總 e5 代誌換新。」親像an2-ni，Pan-iang5 家己重頭新，那親像看見世間逐項換新相e5 款式。照伊e5 身軀伊iau2-ku2做奴僕，屬ti7 殘忍不信 e5 主人，若是照伊 e5 心神有得著thau2放，來屬ti7 基督耶穌， 不止會講是自主。伊地面上e5 主人老、破相，be7家己照顧，盡看這個奴僕。Pan-iang5 比代先koh 較盡本份來服事這個主人；今有koh得著新e5主人 ti7 天--nih8，心所敬愛--e5，就掠伊 e5 擔做輕，真歡喜來擔；攏無推辭講，家己頇慢無本事，才做貧憚 e5 奴僕；是照所有e5 才調，出力利益人歸榮光上帝。

Seng3-chheh kong2,“Ku7 e5 tai7-chi3 koe3--khi3, long2-chong2 e5 tai7-chi3 oaN7-sin.” Chhin-chhiuN7 an2-ni, Pan-iang5 ka-ti7 teng5-thau5-sin, na2 chhin-chhiuN7 khoaN3-kiN3 se3-kan tak8-hang7 oaN7 sin-siuN3 e5 khoan2-sit. Chiau3 i e5 seng-khu i iau2-ku2 cho3 lou5-pok8, siok8 ti7 chan5-jim2 put-sin3 e5 chu2-lang5, na7 si7 chiau3 i e5 sim-sin5 u7 tit tioh8 thau2-pang3, lai5 siok8 ti7 Ki-tok Ia5-sou, put-chi2 e7 kong2 si7 chu7-chu2. I te7-bin7 chiuN7 e5 chu2-lang5 lau7, phoa3-siuN3, be7 ka-ti7 chiau3-kou3, chin7 khoaN3 chit e5 lou5-pok8. Pan-iang5 pi2 tai7-seng koh khah chin7 pun2-hun7 lai5 hok8-sai7 chit e5 chu2-lang5; taN u7 koh tit tioh8 sin e5 chu2-lang5 ti7 thiN--nih8, sim sou2 keng3-ai3--e5, chiu7 liah8 i e5 taN3 cho3 khin, chin hoaN-hi2 lai5 taN; long2 bo5 the-si5 kong2, ka-ti7 ham-ban7 bo5 pun2-su7, chiah cho3 pin5-toaN7 e5 lou5-pok8; si7 chiau3 sou2 u7 e5 chai5-tiau7, chhut-lat8 li7-ek lang5 kui eng5-kng Siong7-te3.
Pan-iang5 起先試看會利益同伴下賤 e5 人，就就近這號 e5 人，將上帝款待伊家己 e5 代誌ka7 in講，請in來相kap行天e5 路，thang得著真 e5 福氣。無偌久這號e5人，幾若個聽見伊講，就醒悟家己 e5 罪，ai3 得耶穌 e5 教示。

Pan-iang5 khi2-seng chhi3-khoaN3 e7 li7-ek tang5-phoaN7 ha7-chian7 e5 lang5, chiu7 chiu7-kin7 chit-ho7 e5 lang5, chiong Siong7-te3 khoan2-thai7 i ka-ti7 e5 tai7-chi3 ka7 in kong2, chhiaN2 in lai5 saN-kap kiaN5 thiN e5 lou7, thang tit tioh8 chin e5 hok-khi3. Bo5 joa7 ku2 chit-ho7 e5 lang5, kui2-na7 e5 thiaN-kiN3 i kong2, chiu7 chhiN2-gou7 ka-ti7 e5 choe7, ai3 tit Ia5-sou e5 ka3-si7.

Pan-iang5 toa7 hoaN-hi2 khi3 hu3 ki5-to2-hoe7. I ki5-to2 khoan2-sit chhin-chhiuN7 gin2-na2 e5 sim, chiong Siong7-te3 sou2 eng3-un2 e5 oe7 lai5 kiu5, long2 bo5 gi5-ngai2 Siong7-te3 tek-khak thiaN, chiau3 sou2 eng3-un2 e5 oe7 lai5 kiaN5. Ia5-sou thiaN3 lang5, u7 koan5-leng5 hoaN-hi2 kiu3 lang5, iah8 bo5 khoaN3-khin ha7-chian7 ou-am3 sim e5 lou5-chai5, Pan-iang5 kong2 chit-ho7 e5 to7-li2 chin ho2 thiaN. Teh kong2 e5 si5, u7-si5 tai7-seng kong2 ka-ti7 cho3 san3-hiong e5 lou5-chai5, ti7 tai7-ke e5 tiong-kan cho3 te7-it ha7-chian7, bo5 lou7-eng7 e5 lang5, ka-ti7 m7 bat ji7, na7 si7 bat thiaN-kiN3 Siong7-te3 e5 lou5-pok8 kong2 Seng3-chheh e5 to7-li2, koh u7 tit tioh8 Seng3-sin5 kam2-tong7 chi2-si7 sim-koaN, sou2-i2 kou-put-chiong tioh8 chiau3 sou2 thiaN--kiN3-e5 sou2 chai--e5, lai5 kong2 hou7 pat8 lang5 thiaN.

Pan-iang5入教liam5-piN chhoa7人來得著教示；有時tu2著有醒悟，tu2著人有信，就歡喜來播。有一擺伊去tiam3 山內較久，就chhoa7 6人來見牧師得著教示。然後這6人kap 幾若個同伴攏總領洗禮入教；無偌久hit所在有十數人常常聚集拜上帝。Chiah-e5 人起頭tui3 Pan-iang5 得著道理，就猶原歡喜hou7 Pan-iang5 教示引chhoa7。Pan-iang5 toe3耶穌不止盡忠，將伊所得著 e5 光來照四面e5 烏暗，不時照機會，koh chhoe7機會thang利益人，歸榮光上帝。祈禱本份有斟酌守，家己sai7-khia祈禱，kap家內 e5 人祈禱，kap眾兄弟聚集祈禱，攏m7 敢be7記--tit。有時聽見講鐘e5 聲，be7-tit thang去禮拜堂，就hit所在kap同伴 e5 人跪落祈禱。早起時頭一項所做就是祈禱，下昏時路尾 e5所做抑是祈禱。有時be7-tit照時食飯，或是得著一條番藷，抑是geng5蕉，抑是麥穗、生食，代先祈禱才敢食。

U7-si5 be7-tit chiau3-si5 chiah8-png7, hek8 si7 tit tioh8 chit8 tiau5 han-chu5, a2 si7 geng5-chio, a2 si7 beh8-sui7, chhiN-chiah8, tai7-seng ki5-to2 chiah kaN2 chiah8.

月會e5 時替萬國 e5 人祈禱，Pan-iang5 罕tit無赴。伊有生一個查某子nia7-tiaN7，雖然真散hiong，iau2-ku2 常常排比thang存淡薄錢，伊kap某子thang te5-ian5，來幫贊基督 e5 國興旺；m7若用祈禱，亦是用錢。伊e5 錢艱苦趁，亦oh-tit 儉斂來積聚，所以te5無偌濟；tu2-tu2 hou7人想著聖冊所記載，hit個散hiong e5 守寡人，短真少，亦hou7 耶穌 o-lo2到極，講，「伊所te5--e5 比眾人較濟。」
